alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 3:22PM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga county. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will intensify during the evening commute today and be heavy at times through late tonight. The heaviest snow will fall away from the lakeshore in the higher elevations of eastern Cuyahoga County. Snow will diminish from west to east on Tuesday morning. Temperatures will fall into the 20s overnight with wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
